Newton Developer Technical Information: Newton Programmer's Guide: 2.1 OS Addendum /
Chapter 7 - Sound / Sound Reference
Protos / protoSoundFrame

GetSampleSize

soundFrame:GetSampleSize()

Returns the size of each sample, in bytes.

return value
An integer indicating the size of each sample, in bytes. This is either 1 or 2, in the 2.1 OS.
